title: News24.com | Tears lets the dogs out in lockdown emergency temporary rehoming
description: Dogs housed at the Tears animal shelter in Cape Town will have an unexpected break from their kennels as the charity launches a campaign to temporarily re-home them ahead of the Covid-19 lockdown.
content:
Stray and abandoned dogs housed at the Tears animal shelter in Cape Town will have an unexpected break from their kennels as the charity launches its "Great Escape" campaign to temporarily re-home their charges ahead of the Covid-19 lockdown. 
Within an hour… [+5139 chars]
